feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar punctuation styles with the use of commas and periods.

feature2.explanation: Both texts show consistency in lexical choices and grammatical structures.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have comparable sentence structures in terms of length and complexity.

feature4.explanation: The narrative styles and tone in both texts are somewhat similar.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the similarities in punctuation, lexical and grammatical features, along with the absence of spelling errors, there is moderate confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
